# webView(_:willPresentEditMenuWithAnimator:)

**Instance Method**

Tells the delegate that the web view is about to present an edit menu.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor optional func webView(_ webView: WKWebView, willPresentEditMenuWithAnimator animator: any UIEditMenuInteractionAnimating)
```

## Displaying an edit menu

- **webView(_:willDismissEditMenuWithAnimator:)**: Tells the delegate that the web view is about to dismiss an edit menu.
